hero.title: Air Conditioning Systems
hero.subtitle: Experience perfect comfort with Daikin's innovative air conditioning solutions. Energy-efficient, reliable, and designed for your home.

products.title: Our Air Conditioning Range
products.subtitle: Discover premium cooling solutions for every space

aurora.name: Daikin Aurora Series
aurora.description: Sleek and stylish wall-mounted unit with advanced filtration and whisper-quiet operation. Perfect for bedrooms and living spaces.

emura.name: Daikin Emura
emura.description: Award-winning design meets cutting-edge technology. The Emura series offers unmatched style and performance for modern homes.

stylish.name: Daikin Stylish
stylish.description: Contemporary design with powerful performance. The Stylish series blends seamlessly with any interior décor while delivering superior comfort.

perfera.name: Daikin Perfera
perfera.description: Ultimate performance with intelligent comfort features. Ideal for larger rooms and demanding applications.

efficiency.title: Superior Efficiency
efficiency.description: Industry-leading SEER ratings that reduce energy costs while keeping you comfortable year-round.

comfort.title: Perfect Comfort
comfort.description: Advanced climate control technology ensures consistent temperature and humidity levels throughout your space.

air.title: Clean Air
air.description: Multi-stage filtration systems remove allergens, dust, and odors for healthier indoor air quality.

hero.title: Heat Pump Systems
hero.subtitle: Sustainable heating and cooling with Daikin's advanced heat pump technology. Save energy while enjoying year-round comfort.

products.title: Our Heat Pump Solutions
products.subtitle: Eco-friendly systems for efficient heating and cooling

daikinFit.name: Daikin Fit
daikinFit.description: Ultra-compact design that fits almost anywhere. Ideal for homes with limited outdoor space without compromising performance.

altherma.name: Daikin Altherma 3
altherma.description: Complete heating and hot water solution for residential applications. Works efficiently even in extreme cold conditions.

althermaH.name: Daikin Altherma 3 H HT
althermaH.description: High-temperature heat pump perfect for retrofit applications. Delivers water up to 70°C for radiator systems.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.description: Reduce your carbon footprint with renewable energy technology that extracts heat from the air.

efficiency.title: Energy Savings
efficiency.description: Up to 50% energy savings compared to traditional heating systems, lowering your utility bills significantly.

versatile.title: Heating & Cooling
versatile.description: One system for year-round comfort. Heat in winter, cool in summer with the same efficient unit.

reliable.title: Reliable Performance
reliable.description: Proven technology that works efficiently even in extreme temperatures, ensuring comfort all year.

hero.title: Air Purifiers
hero.subtitle: Breathe cleaner, healthier air with Daikin's advanced air purification technology. Remove pollutants, allergens, and odors effectively.

products.title: Our Air Purifier Range
products.subtitle: Advanced filtration for healthier indoor environments

mc55w.name: Daikin MC55W
mc55w.description: Perfect for small to medium rooms. Combines HEPA filtration with Streamer technology for comprehensive air purification.

mc70l.name: Daikin MC70L
mc70l.description: Powerful air purifier designed for larger spaces. Removes 99.97% of airborne particles with advanced multi-stage filtration.

mcz70w.name: Daikin MCZ70W
mcz70w.description: Ultimate air treatment system that purifies and humidifies. Maintains optimal humidity while removing allergens and pollutants.

streamer.title: Streamer Technology
streamer.description: Daikin's proprietary Streamer technology decomposes allergens, viruses, and bacteria at molecular level.

hepa.title: HEPA Filtration
hepa.description: Captures 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns including dust, pollen, and pet dander.

humidifying.title: Humidifying Function
humidifying.description: Maintains optimal humidity levels for improved comfort and respiratory health throughout the year.

accessories.name: Daikin Accessories

smart.title: Smart Controls
smart.description: Intelligent thermostats and controllers that optimize comfort while reducing energy consumption.
